thread.title: Sidek Hassan to head Bank Negara forex task force
thread.title_full: Sidek Hassan to head Bank Negara forex task force

title: Sidek Hassan to head Bank Negara forex task force
text:
Former chief secretary to the government Mohd Sidek Hassan has been appointed to lead a task force, which has been formed to investigate the losses made by Bank Negara in foreign exchange trading, during the late 1980s, reports Bernama. 
This was reportedly announced by the Prime Minister's office this evening. 
For the rest of this story and more, subscribe for only RM150 a year. If you're already a subscriber, please sign in.
